sqlMap.select: SELECT Buoy_No AS BUOY_NO FROM dbo.TB_AIS21

SELECT count(a.mmsi) FROM SPM.dbo.TB_AIS123 a, SPM.dbo.TB_AIS5 b where a.MMSI =b.mmsi and a.TimeStampK = b.TimeStampK and a.Latitude > '35.34033442007605' and a.Latitude < '35.74038185534101' and a.Longitude > '129.34066772460938' and a.Longitude < '130.21820068359375'

SELECT a.mmsi, a.TimeStampK as timestampk, a.Latitude as latitude, a.Longitude as longitude, b.ShipName as shipname FROM SPM.dbo.TB_AIS123 a, SPM.dbo.TB_AIS5 b where a.MMSI =b.mmsi and a.TimeStampK = b.TimeStampK and a.Latitude > #lat2# and a.Latitude < #lat1# and a.Longitude > #lon2# and a.Longitude < #lon1# order by a.MMSI, a.TimeStampK

SELECT a.mmsi, min(a.TimeStampK) as min_timestampk, max(a.TimeStampK) as max_timestampk, b.ShipName as shipname FROM SPM.dbo.TB_AIS123 a, SPM.dbo.TB_AIS5 b WHERE a.MMSI =b.mmsi and a.TimeStampK = b.TimeStampK AND CONVERT(DATE, a.TimeStampK) BETWEEN CONVERT(DATE, #date1#) AND CONVERT(DATE, #date2#)
a.MMSI like '%$mmsi$%'
b.ShipName like '%$shipname$%'
GROUP BY a.MMSI, b.ShipName ORDER BY a.MMSI, b.ShipName
